sn1.31:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn1.31:1.3: Atha kho sambahula satullapakayika devatayo abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu.
sn1.31:1.4: Ekamantam thita kho eka devata bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
sn1.31:3.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
sn1.31:5.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
sn1.31:7.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
sn1.31:9.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
sn1.31:11.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
sn1.31:13.1: Atha kho apara devata bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn1.31:14.1: “Sabbasam vo subhasitam pariyayena, api ca mamapi sunatha—
sn1.31:16.2: Attamana ta devatayo bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayimsuti.
